_header: As in the Church four points
_description: On the four parts of the Mass (Introit, Collects, Readings, Secrets) — two 8-line stanzas

CULGg432.First Lines:
As in the churche iiii poyntesSo in the scripture
                    loke…
CULGg432.Last Lines:
…thepistell & gospel lernythe vsthe secretes to
                    assay
